participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Carefree, fun-loving, and free-spirited. She has a vivid imagination and often gets lost in her thoughts.
participant_1.background: I binged on British shows and movies while I was confined to my bed on vacation. I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts. I enjoy John Grisham movies, but not his books. I enjoy cold winters and strong breezes.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Passionate and dedicated, with a strong desire to help others. He has a playful side and enjoys sports and food.
participant_2.background: I fear that I will not be able to help my patients as well as I want to. My favorite band is Bon Iver. I have my own salon. I play quarterback. I am an omnivore.

content.text: I am having a good day so far. Just got back from the beach. How are you doing?
I am doing good! Just finished work. I am a hair stylist in my own salon.
That sounds like a fun job! How long have you been doing it?
I have been doing it for 10 years. I love it!
What do you like most about it?
I love getting to meet new people and make them feel good about themselves.
That is so sweet! I am sure you are great at your job.
Thank you! I try my best.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to play sports. I am the quarterback for my local football team.
That sounds fun! Do you play any other sports?
I also enjoy playing basketball and baseball.
Wow! You must be really athletic.
I try my best! I am also a bit of a foodie.
That is my favorite! What is your favorite food?
Me too! We should go out for pizza sometime.
